name: plexus
title: Plexus - Localhost Search
description: Discover and manage all running Node.js development servers on your localhost with smart project detection, framework identification, and quick access.
author: RensHoogendam

commands.name: plexus
commands.title: Search Localhost
commands.subtitle: Plexus
commands.description: Search through the running projects in your localhost.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
